# UISplitViewController.BackgroundStyle

**Enumeration**

Styles that apply a visual effect to the background of a primary view controller.

## Declaration

```swift
enum BackgroundStyle
```

## Background styles

- **UISplitViewController.BackgroundStyle.none**: A style that has no visual effect on the background appearance of the primary view controller.
- **UISplitViewController.BackgroundStyle.sidebar**: A style that applies a blurred effect to the background of the primary view controller.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Managing the background style

- **primaryBackgroundStyle**: The background style of the primary view controller.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
